item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-11-29
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Walking around Disney's Port Orleans reliving past family vacations. #
  • Christmas tree in Port Orleans #
  • Chimichanga #
  • iPhone keeps giving me "No Sim Card" error. Reboots have fixed it, but on 6th one today. Off to AT&T tommorrow it seems. Sigh. #
  • I'm at Colonial Hobby & Photo (634 Mills Avenue, Colonial Drive & Mills Ave, Orlando). #
